title: Elbow Grease Pink Scrub Mate Kitchen Bathroom Soft & Hard Non Scratch Cleaning Sponge, One Size
features: SOFT & HARD SPONGE: The Elbow Grease Pink Scrub Mate sponge features soft/hard features depending on the water temperature. This magic sponge softens when used in warm water and stiffens in cold water. The product comes back to its hard form when completely dry

VERSATILE: Use this Pink Scrub Mate to clean pots, pans, ovens, worktops, appliances, tiles, kitchen and bathroom sinks, showers, toilets and much more. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, the Elbow Grease Pink Scrub Mate will get your garden furniture clean and fresh for the summer season. Ideal for use with the Elbow Grease Pink All Purpose Degreaser spray

NON-SCRATCH FLEXIBLE DESIGN: The Pink Scrub Mate can be hand-washed, and reused whenever you need it. Thanks to its non-scratch properties it keeps surfaces 100 Percentdirt, stain and grease-free without damaging them
ABOUT THE PRODUCT: Pink: Measurements - 13.5x9cm. Hand wash, air dry. Not suitable for coated pots and pans
description: Keep your kitchen, bathroom and other areas stain, grease and grime-free with this Pink Scrub Mate Sponge, the miracle product from Elbow Grease. This Scrub Mate softens when used in warm water and stiffens in cold water. The product comes back to its hard form when completely dry. Perfect to clean pots, pans, oven, worktops, appliances, tiles, kitchen and bathroom sinks and showers. Pack of 1 pink scrub mate
